markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Forgetful Ink](/Equipment.aspx?ID=969)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Contact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=37" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 32 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Used to write secret messages, a single dose of forgetful ink is enough to pen a page of text, often with flourishes extending to the page's edges. Anyone handling the page is exposed to the poison. This includes casual reading, unless the reader specifically takes precautions not to physically touch it. Unlike other poisons, forgetful ink retains its potency for one year, regardless of the number of victims exposed.

**Saving Throw** DC 20 Fortitude ([secret](/Traits.aspx?ID=142)); **Onset** 1 minute; **Stage 1** The reader forgets the contents of the writing, recalling it as blank or as inconsequential text.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Forgetful Ink
